Hi, I'm Ian Wade

Since 2016, I have been strengthening my skills across multiple disciplines, including programming & computer science, web development, UI/UX, graphic & motion design, and more. Learning new skills excites and motivates me greatly!

I am a recent graduate of Lindenwood University in St. Charles, MO (May 2023)

Development

Coach's Corner

A fully featured, web-based athlete management system for storing and visualizing athlete data, developed for use by the Lindenwood University athletics department

2023

Brief: Coach’s Corner was a senior capstone development, and stores athletes’ KPI (Key Performance Indicators) data logged by coaches & other athletic staff that can then be visualized on various graph types. Displays raw scores, T-Scores, and spider graph functionally. Supports multiple users and is accessible from anywhere.

Contributions: User Interface Design, Front-End Development, Back-End Development, User Testing

Tools Used

View Source

UI/UX

CatShack

User interface design mockup of a fictious e-commerce site for pet-related goods with a focus on feline companions

2022

Brief: CatShack was developed for a course at Lindenwood. We were tasked with developing a UI for an e-commerce website surrounding a topic of our choosing. Keeping in line with my love of cats, I developed the brand CatShack, including it's logo and company values. While it is fictious, the research process was similar to that of a real development, including wireframe mockups, user personas & testing, and a final, functional UI mockup.

Contributions: User Interface Design, User Testing
